text: @PressSec @realDonaldTrump South Korea got on it early and vanquished Coronavirus.... Your boss minimized it and then chose a test that benefited his freinds.  The test failed in production.  Now South Korea is booming and US is in lockdown.  Your boss chose his freinds profits over lives of citizens
